title: The Ordinary Sacred

panel_structure.description: Wide shot of sun-dappled forest path, Evan and Architect walking side by side, their connection visible as subtle light between them
Close on their shadows merging naturally on the path while they remain distinct above

transformation_notes: Returning to the forest where they first met, but now carrying all they've learned. The ordinary becomes sacred through their transformed perception.
dialogue_rhythm: Comfortable silences, soft exchanges, profound simplicity
